title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.44 - Delivery of fuel to be under control of attendant
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.44 - Delivery of fuel to be under control of attendant

State Regulations

The delivery of fuel shall at all times be under the
control of the vehicle attendant. Through use of approved flow controlling
devices operated by the attendant, designated to shut off automatically upon
release of hand or foot pressure, latching or fastening devices on the control
units are not permitted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.44

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
